casebody.data:
Korey BOSSIER
v.
Mark GARBER, et al. NO. 2018-C-0541 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 15, 2018

Granted. The matter is remanded to the court of appeal for en banc consideration in order to reconcile its holding in the instant case with its holding in *685Barlow v. Garber, 17-0401 (La. App. 3 Cir. 11/2/17), 230 So.3d 1002.
